titleStmt.title: Die Sabbatie 9. April. 1642. The Lords and commons do declare, that they intend a due and necessary reformation of the government and liturgie of the church, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printed to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Title from first words of text.
Parliament intends a reformation of the government and liturgy of the church after consultation with divines. It will establish learned and preaching ministers throughout the whole kingdom.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
